msg.msgText: A call to the setDeliveryMode() method on a producer failed because the input value is not a valid delivery mode. Valid delivery modes are DeliveryMode.NON_PERSISTENT and DeliveryMode.PERSISTENT.

msgExplanation.p: The input value for calls to the setDeliveryMode() method must be DeliveryMode.NON_PERSISTENT or DeliveryMode.PERSISTENT.

msgUserResponse.p: Use only valid delivery mode values: DeliveryMode.NON_PERSISTENT and DeliveryMode.PERSISTENT.
